logoEditor.title: Logo Editor Assistant
logoEditor.subtitle: AI-powered logo modifications
logoEditor.initialGreeting: Here is your selected logo. You can ask me to modify it!
logoEditor.welcomeMessage: Tell me what changes you'd like to make. For example: "Make it more modern", "Change the colors to blue", "Add a gradient effect", etc.

placeholders.prompt: Describe the changes you want... (Press Enter to send)

errors.modificationFailed: Sorry, I encountered an error while modifying the logo. Please try again with a different prompt.

projectDescription.whatToBuild: What do you want to build ?
projectDescription.tellUsMore: Tell us more about your project idea
projectDescription.placeholder: An app that generates poems from photos

mpesa.name: M-Pesa Clone
mpesa.description: A mobile money transfer and microfinancing service for African markets
mpesa.prompt: A mobile money platform like M-Pesa with secure transactions, agent network management, and financial inclusion features for rural communities in Africa

agritech.name: Agri-Tech Platform
agritech.description: Farm management system for small-scale African farmers
agritech.prompt: An agricultural management platform for small-scale African farmers with weather forecasting, crop disease detection using AI, and marketplace for selling produce directly to buyers

solar.name: Solar Pay-as-you-go
solar.description: Solar energy payment and management system
solar.prompt: A pay-as-you-go solar energy management system for off-grid communities in Africa with mobile payments, usage tracking, and maintenance alerts

health.name: Health Passport
health.description: Digital health records for underserved communities
health.prompt: A digital health passport app for underserved African communities that works offline, stores vaccination records, and connects patients with local healthcare providers

artisan.name: African Artisan Marketplace
artisan.prompt: An e-commerce platform connecting African artisans directly with global buyers, featuring secure payments, logistics management, and cultural storytelling for each product

edtech.name: EdTech for Low Bandwidth
edtech.description: Educational platform optimized for low connectivity
edtech.prompt: An educational platform designed for low-bandwidth African regions with offline content caching, SMS-based learning modules, and localized curriculum in multiple African languages
